mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_FOLLOW (ID, FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID, FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID) VALUES (SEQ_FOLLOW.NEXTVAL, #{followerMemberId}, #{followingMemberId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID, FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID, FOLLOW_FAVORITE, FOLLOWING_DATE FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = #{followingMemberId} AND FOLLOW_FAVORITE = 1

SELECT TM.ID, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_STATUS_MESSAGE, TM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, TM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH, ( SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = TM.ID ) AS FOLLOWER_COUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = TM.ID ) AS FOLLOWING_COUNT, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = TM.ID AND FOLLOW_FAVORITE = 1 ) AS FAVORITE, ( SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = TM.ID ) AS IS_FOLLOW FROM TBL_MEMBER TM WHERE TM.ID = #{profileCardMemberId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{followerMemberId} AND FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = #{followingMemberId}
DELETE FROM TBL_FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} OR FOLLOWING_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
